alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 28 at 3:28PM HST until December 29 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND... .An extra-large north-northwest 340 degrees swell combined with a large north swell 350 degrees will continue warning level surf for north and west facing shores of the smaller islands and advisory level surf for north facing shores of the Big Island. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Surf 15 to 20 feet. * WHERE...North facing shores of the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Big Island East; Big Island North
